name: Switch
description: A switch toggle component from Fluent UI that allows users to toggle between two states, typically on/off or enabled/disabled.

props.name: checked
props.description: Whether the switch is in the on (checked) state

props.name: defaultChecked
props.description: Default checked state for uncontrolled switch

props.name: label
props.description: Label to display next to the switch

props.name: labelPosition
props.description: Position of the label relative to the switch

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback fired when the switch state changes
